properties.areaDesc: Fire Island Inlet NY to Moriches Inlet NY out 20 nm
properties.headline: Gale Watch issued January 3 at 3:12PM EST until January 5 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Upton NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, seas 3 to 5 feet. For the
Gale Watch, northwest winds 20 to 25 kt with gusts up to 35 kt
and seas 4 to 7 feet possible.

* WHERE...Fire Island Inlet NY to Moriches Inlet NY out 20 nm.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 8 PM EST this
evening. For the Gale Watch, from late Saturday night through
Sunday afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and seas.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON
